text: Carlos Páez Vilaró (1 November 1923 - 24 February 2014) was a Uruguayan abstract artist, painter, potter, sculptor, muralist, writer, composer and constructor. He composed numerous musical pieces in the two genres and conducted an orchestra. He was born in Montevideo. He was of Catalan ancestry. Vilaró died on 24 February 2014 at his home in Punta Ballena, Maldonado. He was aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Musicians from Montevideo Category:Artists Category:Architects Category:Painters from South America Category:Uruguayan composers Category:Potters Category:Writers from Montevideo Category:20th- century composers
title: Carlos Páez Vilaró
